original_text: Behold, the day of the Lord cometh, cruel both with wrath and fierce anger, to lay the land desolate: and he shall destroy the sinners thereof out of it.
korean_text: 보라 여호와의 날 곧 잔혹히 분냄과 맹렬히 노하는 날이 이르러 땅을 황폐하게 하며 그 중에서 죄인들을 멸하리니

sentences.original_text: Behold, the day of the Lord cometh
cruel both with wrath and fierce anger
and he shall destroy the sinners thereof out of it
